data.actual_result: Nothing happens when the form is submitted, Discord crashes when the form is closed
data.expected_result: On submission, an error is shown saying the CVC is invalid, and when closed, the form closes normally.
data.short_description: Discord crashes on invalid credit card CVC when adding a new payment method
data.steps_to_repro: - Navigate to the Billing tab in the settings - Press 'add payment method' - Select 'Credit Card' - Fill in a valid card number, expiration and name, but an invalid CVC - Fill in the country, address, city, state and postal code - Submit the form - Try to close it - Observe
